Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Rome Cavalieri, Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, you'll be centrally located in Rome, convenient to Tribunale Ordinario di Roma - Sezione Penale and St. Peter's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 370 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 3 outdoor swimming pools, a health club, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 6 km.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has 69965 square feet (6500 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Rome Cavalieri, Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, you'll be centrally located in Rome, convenient to Tribunale Ordinario di Roma - Sezione Penale and St. Peter's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tribunale Ordinario di Roma - Sezione Penale - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Rome Observatory - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Piazzale Clodio - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Pineto Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Villa Madama - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Nature Reserve of Monte Mario - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Vatican Museums - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Olimpico Theater - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Foro Italico - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Olympic Swimming Stadium - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Vatican Library - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Casina Pio IV - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
RAI Headquarters - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Olympic Stadium - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Vatican Gardens - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Rome Cavalieri, Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Rome Cavalieri, Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
